one_reviews_text: this is such a fun game i had fun playing it sadley there was no one playing online so i didint get to see how that was but i still had a good time on single player
Was fun to play..  not clear where to wend... i recomment this game, keep up the good work!.

This demo is awesome.!  I'm excited for when its released fully and I can experience the open-world side of it!  However,  at random moments, the movement speed goes from normal to limping zombie, even if I'm just wondering around the base.  If that gets fixed,  this game would be worthy of a 5-star rating.

Graphics functional - simple but stylish. Some glitchy stuff like vanishing zombies, but it is just a demo. Most irritating thing is the manual reloading of weapons, nobody needs this kind of fiddly nonsense in VR. You get caught out and eaten alive while fumbling around trying to put ammo in guns. And the shotgun only takes two rounds! Tip to devs - if you're trying to make this fun then simplify reloading.
review_feedback: Thanks for your feedback! The game was just updated and you can now switch to 'Simplified' reloading (inside the settings menu). With this feature enabled, you can just drop your current mag and move the gun towards your body to reload - instead of inserting the mag by hand.

one_reviews_text: I played through the demo and enjoyed the game play and style.  I am not the biggest fan of wave shooters so I am definitely looking forward to the open world content described by the Devs.  I really believe this will be a very enjoyable game once released.
When a zombie gets close you just freeze. You cant move or reload
The game is very fun(ish) reloading is BAD but its ok.
review_feedback: Thanks for your awesome review! You should check out the newest update and enable 'Simplified' reloading inside your settings. This will make reloading much easier. Just drop your current mag and move the gun towards your body to reload.
